title: Coconut, Turkey and Lime Wild Rice Soup
directions: In large, heavy pot, heat oil over medium heat. Add onion, carrots, celery, red pepper and cauliflower. Saute until they are soft and begin to brown. Stir in wild rice, coconut milk, turkey and coconut. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Simmer for 5 minutes. Stir in sambal to taste. Add lime juice. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Garnish with chopped cilantro.
Shopper’s note: Unsweetened coconut is widely available these days, but if you can’t find it, rinse sweetened coconut in colander until water runs clear and you can’t taste the sugar.
ingredients: 4 to 6 cups chicken or turkey stock
1/2 cup unsweetened shredded coconut (see shopper’s note)
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
